content: Brookfield Property Partners LP   one of the world's largest commercial real estate companies  on Monday made an unsolicited bid to buy the 66 percent stake in mall owner GGP Inc  it does not already own for $14.8 billion.
name: GGP Inc
title: Brookfield Property offers to buy rest of mall owner GGP for $14.8 billion

content: * Brookfield Property shares fall 5 pct (Adds Breakingviews link)
name: GGP Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Brookfield Property offers to buy rest of mall owner GGP for $14.8 bln

content: Nov 13 Brookfield Property Partners LP said on Monday it offered to take full control of mall owner GGP Inc  valuing the company at $21.6 billion.
name: GGP Inc
title: Brookfield Property Partners offers to buy rest of mall owner GGP

content: * Brookfield Property Partners L.P. proposes to acquire GGP Inc. For $23.00 per share in a combination of cash and BPY units

content: NEW YORK  Aug 2 For an industry under siege by e-commerce and searching for relief  mall owner GGP Inc's announcement earlier on Wednesday that it is shelving plans to explore asset sales hit the stock hard and underscored the struggles facing brick-and-mortar retailers.
name: GGP Inc
title: U.S. retail REITs cannot find upside despite strong numbers

content: NEW YORK Shares of GGP Inc   a large owner of malls and regional shopping centers  fell sharply on Wednesday after the company said it would stay the course and not sell assets following a board review of all "strategic alternatives" announced in May.
name: GGP Inc
title: Shares of mall owner GGP drop after halting strategic alternative plan

content: * GGP Inc sees full year net income per share attributable to GGP $0.58 to $0.62
name: GGP Inc
title: BRIEF-GGP Inc Q2 EPS $0.13

content: NEW YORK  June 7 The head of GGP Inc  one of the biggest high-quality U.S. mall property owners  sees the recent spate of U.S. department store closings as a chance to expand its redevelopment operations with plans to buy 100 of the shuttered emporiums.
name: GGP Inc
title: Mall owner GGP doubles down on brick and mortar retailing

content: * GGP reports first quarter 2017 results and declares second quarter dividend
name: GGP Inc
title: BRIEF-GGP reports Q1 earnings per share $0.11

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  January 06 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the long-term Issuer  Default Rating (IDR) on Macy's  Inc. (Macy's) and Macy's Retail Holdings  Inc.  (MRHI) at 'BBB' and affirmed the short-term IDR at 'F2'. The Rating Outlook has  been revised to Negative from Stable. A full list of rating actions follows at  the end of this release. The Negative Outlook reflects Fitch's reduced confidence in Macy's ability to  stabilize compara
name: GGP Inc
title: Fitch Affirms Macy's  Inc. at 'BBB'; Outlook Revised to Negative

content: SAO PAULO  Nov 25 Aliansce Shopping Centers SA is eyeing several acquisition targets across Brazil's mall industry as a way to fuel growth in the near term  although prices seem too stretched at this point  Chief Executive Officer Renato Rique said on Friday.
name: GGP Inc
title: Brazil's Aliansce considering mall M&A  sees prices as high

content: Feb 3 General Growth Properties Inc said on Wednesday that a statement concerning Amazon.com Inc  made by its chief executive  Sandeep Mathrani  was not intended to represent Amazon's plans.
name: GGP Inc
title: General Growth Properties CEO clarifies comment on Amazon

content: Brookfield Asset Management Inc  has been exploring an acquisition in recent months of General Growth Properties Inc (GGP)   the U.S. mall operator with a market value of $24 billion  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: GGP Inc
title: Exclusive: Brookfield mulls buying mall operator General Growth -sources
